detail_desc: Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Padded back plate with a padded laptop sleeve for computers up to 13" and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 14x31x39.5 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey made from a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a rolled, raw-edge hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and a small fabric appliqué at the hem of one leg.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with flounces at the top and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a wide neckline, narrow elastication at the top and inset lace trims at the front. Wide sleeves and smocking and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved top in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short, V-neck dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a wrapover front and long puff sleeves with a button and pleated frill at the cuffs. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Slides with a fluted rubber sole.

prod_name: SB Nicholas water resi Ski Jkt
detail_desc: Padded ski jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, a chest pocket, a sleeve pocket and zipped side pockets. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short legs and press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy viscose weave with ties at the front and a concealed zip in the side.
Scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes on the short sides.
Non-padded bras in lace with underwired, mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Gently flared top in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and decorative gathers at the neckline and short, elasticated raglan sleeves.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Blouse in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a square neckline front and back and decorative button placket. Smocked section at the back, short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top and hems, and a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Knitted set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with flounces down the top, a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Long cardigan in transparent mesh with wide, 3/4-length sleeves, high slits in the sides and no fasteners.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains decorated with metal pendants. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved, checked shirt in a soft viscose weave with a brushed finish. Small frilled collar, flounces over the shoulders, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jacket in crushed velvet with a printed jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Long sleeves with a frill down the side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in stretch twill with an embroidered motif on one side, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a foldover V-neck collar, buttons down the front, a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Backpack in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish and print motif on the front. Two-way zip with a faux fur pendant and a handle at the top. Adjustable, lightly padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 11x24x33 cm.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey, one patterned.
Sports joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets, a zipped back pocket and elasticated hems.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. No buttons.
Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in lightly crêped satin with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam with pleats at the waist and short butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a wide, relaxed fit with a wrapover V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a soft weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons at the front and flap chest pockets. Seam with a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Blouse in airy crêpe fabric with a gathered seam around the neckline, concealed buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, and a flounce at the hem.
Advent calendar with a piece of jewellery behind each door. The calendar contains earrings, rings, charms, necklaces and bracelets in various designs. Size of calendar 26x26 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.

Long dress in chiffon with a lace bodice, frilled collar and long sleeves with scalloped edges. Integral corset with boning at the sides, and a seam at the waist with a small frill trim and concealed, adjustable elastication. Covered buttons and a concealed zip down the back. Heavily draping skirt that is slightly longer at the back forming a small train. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey. Two in a solid colour and three with print motifs.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sunglasses in plastic with metal details. UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and narrow ties at the neckline. Covered buttons and flounces at the top, flounced trims at the shoulders, long sleeves and frill trims at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a seam at the hem. Lined skirt.
Leather handbag with a detachable shoulder strap, two handles, zip at the top and a tab and metal fastener. Three smaller compartments, one with a zip. Twill lining. Size 14x28x37 cm.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in twill with pleats at the top, a detachable belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a decorative tab with metal letters on the flap and a concealed magnetic fastener. Detachable, adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 6.5x15x19 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. The scarf is made partly from recycled polyester. Size 52x190 cm.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with fixed ties and a double-layered top. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elasticated frill trims at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in stretch viscose jersey with wrapover draping at the bust and long sleeves. Lined.
Short, fitted dress with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back with lace details and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts. Lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
5-pocket, high-waisted straight jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly and button.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long gilet knitted in a soft alpaca wool blend with a V-neck, ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem, and slits in the sides.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back with a lace trim, and long sleeves.
Multi-strand bracelet with imitation leather straps and a metal clasp with a magnetic fastener.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Bag decoration with a rabbit-shaped soft toy, and a carabiner hook and keyring at the top. Size approx. 10x14 cm.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
